title: Dramatic end to slow-moving Houston car chase
text:
Dramatic end to slow-moving Houston car chase 5:11pm GMT - 01:50 
After crossing Houston freeways to escape authorities, the driver who led police on a hourlong pursuit during heavy rush hour traffic, was finally stopped on Thursday morning. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
After crossing Houston freeways to escape authorities, the driver who led police on a hourlong pursuit during heavy rush hour traffic, was finally stopped on Thursday morning.
